Summary: Biochemical reaction from voriconazole to 4-hydroxyvoriconazole. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP3A4.

Controller: CYP2C19, CYP2C9, CYP3A4, FMO1, FMO3, FMO5
Summary: Biochemical reaction from voriconazole to voriconazole n-oxide. This interaction can be catalyzed by FMO3, FMO1, CYP3A4, FMO5, CYP2C9 or CYP2C19.
Biochemical reaction from voriconazole to hydroxyvoriconazole. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP2C19.
Biochemical reaction from dihydroxyvoriconazole to dihydroxyvoriconazole o-glucuronide. This interaction is catalyzed by UGT1A4.
Biochemical reaction from hydroxyvoriconazole to hydroxyvoriconazole o-glucuronide. This interaction is catalyzed by UGT1A4.
Biochemical reaction from hydroxyvoriconazole to dihydroxyvoriconazole. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP2C19.
Biochemical reaction from 4-hydroxyvoriconazole to 4-hydroxyvoriconazole 4-o-glucuronide. This interaction is catalyzed by UGT1A4.
